body:
It's overflowing the int (64-bit when running locally,
32-bit when running on the playground.)

Python does transparent bignum for you, so it
works there.

If you want to have that for Go too, see the
math/big package at https://golang.org/pkg/math/big.

And btw, please ask questions like this on other
mediums, this issue tracker is for bugs and
proposals only. See https://golang.org/wiki/Questions.
